mapper.insert: insert into player (team_id, name, position) values (#{teamId}, #{name}, #{positionDescription})
mapper.select: with combined_teams as ( select player.position, player.name, team.name as team_name from player join team on player.team_id = team.id ) select position, max(case when team_name = '한화 이글스' then name end) as "한화 이글스", max(case when team_name = '두산 베어스' then name end) as "두산 베어스", max(case when team_name = '롯데 자이언츠' then name end) as "롯데 자이언츠" from combined_teams group by position;
